info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 27 at 3:54PM EDT until July 27 at 5:00PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: The National Weather Service in Albany has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Litchfield County in northern Connecticut... Southeastern Ulster County in east central New York... Dutchess County in east central New York... * Until 500 PM EDT. * At 354 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Rhinebeck, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Poughkeepsie, Kingston, Rhinebeck, Hyde Park, Milton, Pleasant Valley, Amenia, Kent, Sharon, Highland, Pine Plains, Red Hook, Millbrook, Millerton, Stanfordville, Gaylordsville, Port Ewen, Fairview, Red Oaks Mill and Lake Katrine. Please report hail size...damaging winds and reports of trees down to the National Weather Service by email at Alb.Stormreport@noaa.gov... On Facebook at www.facebook.com/nwsalbany or twitter @nwsalbany HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
